Articles.Content:
Fresh recruit here, prompted to buy KSP after visiting these forums.

I have to say the level of support being offered by fellow players is fantastic and the sense of community here is something I have not seen at this level in a gaming in many years.

As for KSP haven't had this much fun since 1983 (ZX Spectrums version of Jetpack)

I have kissed my wife and kids and let them know I love them, time to extend my holiday leave at work
Hi Gordo. I also have found this forum to be unusually helpful.

As for KSP haven't had this much fun since 1983 (ZX Spectrums version of Jetpack)

Wow, I'd all but forgotten about Jetpac. One of the first games I played on my spectrum.

Welcome aboard!

Wow, I'd all but forgotten about Jetpac. One of the first games I played on my spectrum.

Thanks for the welcome Vanamonde, spaceBrezel and pxi and good to know there are other old-timers out there

I have to say the level of support being offered by fellow players is fantastic and the sense of community here is something I have not seen at this level in a gaming in many years.

Enjoy it. There is a distinct lack of that in the modern gaming community. Its a wonderful thing and should not be taken for granted.

NORN IRON!

Glad to see you here!
